sentences.en: A further refinement in semiconductor technology is the integrated circuit.
sentences.cn: 在半导体工艺中,集成电路是一次革新.
一个各种族和谐相处的社会

sentences.en: All the department reports should be integrated into one annual statement.
sentences.cn: 各部门的报告应结合在一起成为一份年度报告.

sentences.en: Basing himself on the realities of his life, the painter successfully integrated realism and artistic exaggeration.
sentences.cn: 画家根据自己的现实生活, 成功地把现实主义和艺术夸张结合起来.

sentences.en: Even in this case the equations of motion cannot be integrated exactly.
sentences.cn: 即使是在这种情况下,运动方程也是不能精确积分的.

sentences.en: Integrated circuit has had a very significant impact on digital system development.
sentences.cn: 集成电路的出现与发展使数字系统的设计工作发生了巨大的变化.

sentences.en: Questioned data will inevitably be incorporated in the integrated model.
sentences.cn: 有疑问的数据不可避免地要并入综合模型里.

sentences.en: The joint venture is integrated into the dominant parent's management system.
sentences.cn: 合资企业的管理业务全部纳入母公司的管理系统.

sentences.en: The modern successor to the transistor is the integrated circuit.
sentences.cn: 晶体管的现代后继者是集成电路.

sentences.en: The protoplasts of attached cells are connected and integrated by plasmodesmata.
sentences.cn: 接触的细胞的原生质体通过原生质连丝连接成一体.

sentences.en: The residential blocks were integrated with the rest of the college.
sentences.cn: 住宿区与学院其他部分结合在了一起.

sentences.en: The use of integrated pest management will expand in the twenty - first century.
sentences.cn: 在二十一世纪,害虫综合治理的应用将扩大.

sentences.en: There was about Jephson a hard , integrated earnestness which soon convinced Clyde.
sentences.cn: 杰甫逊的坚决与认真立刻使克莱德心悦诚服.

sentences.en: They soon became fully integrated into the local community.
sentences.cn: 他们很快就完全融入了当地人的圈子.

sentences.en: This computer program can be integrated with existing programs.
sentences.cn: 这套计算机程序可以与现有的程序整合在一起.

sentences.en: We believe that pupils of integrated schools will have more tolerant attitudes.
sentences.cn: 我们相信在取消种族隔离的学校就读的学生会有更宽容的态度。

words.tran_cn: [数] 整数；整体；完整的事物
[自] 积分器；[电子] 积分电路；整合之人
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体
使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和
综合的；完整的；互相协调的

phrases.tran_cn: 整合营销；整合行销；整合市场营销
集成光学；积体光学；集成光路
综合业务；集成服务；集成运输

trans.tran_cn: 完整的，整体的，结合的，（各组成部分）和谐的
trans.tran_en: an integrated system, institution etc combines many different groups, ideas, or parts in a way that works well

trans.tran_cn: 使一体化( integrate的过去式和过去分词 )，使整合，使完整，使结合成为整体
